reviewText: I was on the production team for this video, so I got to see it all unfold firsthand. I used a lot of the tips I learned from Tom during production when painting my own home, and I found that the tips Tom provides helped make the painting process easier with a lot better quality results. Though I considered myself a fairly experienced DIY-er when it came to painting home interiors, I discovered that I had a lot to learn from Tom. I highly recommend this video!

I watched this video before I painted my front hallway, and found it very helpful. This was my first painting project and it took me through everything I needed to know. It enabled me to get professional results, and I've gotten lots of compliments on my work.
